response.overview: For years a neighborhood has enjoyed unprecedented peace and prosperity. Residents feel safe walking the streets at night. This good fortune is due to the dedicated efforts of a small neighborhood team led by Mason, a family man and software developer. Mason and his partners, Maya and Tony, also work hard to de-escalate any potential violence in the neighborhood.  Suddenly, a string of armed robberies occurs and causes great concern. Mason, Maya, and Tony are pressed to figure out who’s committing these crimes. One robbery hits close to home and Mason takes it personal. He discovers he has an unexpected adversary who wants to destroy everything he’s built. Mason can’t let this happen.
response.title: Together
